sn35.138:4.2: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.138:4.4: The eye isn’t yours: give it up.
sn35.138:4.6: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.138:4.10: mind isn’t yours: give it up.
sn35.138:4.12: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.138:4.13: Suppose a person was to carry off the grass, sticks, branches, and leaves in this Jeta’s Grove, or burn them, or do what they want with them. Would you think:
sn35.138:4.14: ‘This person is carrying us off, burning us, or doing what they want with us?’”
sn35.138:4.17: Because that’s neither self nor belonging to self.”
sn35.138:4.18: “In the same way, the eye isn’t yours: give it up.
sn35.138:4.20: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.138:4.24: mind isn’t yours: give it up.
sn35.138:4.26: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.”
